程序包 net.minecraftforge.client.event

类 EntityViewRenderEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.Event
      • net.minecraftforge.client.event.EntityViewRenderEvent
  • 直接已知子类:
    EntityViewRenderEvent.CameraSetup, EntityViewRenderEvent.FogColors, EntityViewRenderEvent.FogDensity, EntityViewRenderEvent.FOVModifier, EntityViewRenderEvent.RenderFogEvent
    public abstract class EntityViewRenderEvent
extends Event
    Event that hooks into EntityRenderer, allowing any feature to customize visual attributes the player sees.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      修饰符和类型 类 说明
      static class  EntityViewRenderEvent.CameraSetup
      Event that allows mods to alter the angles of the player's camera.
      static class  EntityViewRenderEvent.FogColors
      Event that allows any feature to customize the color of fog the player sees.
      static class  EntityViewRenderEvent.FogDensity
      Event that allows any feature to customize the fog density the player sees.
      static class  EntityViewRenderEvent.FOVModifier
      Event that allows mods to alter the raw FOV itself.
      static class  EntityViewRenderEvent.RenderFogEvent
      Event that allows any feature to customize the rendering of fog.

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.Event

        Event.HasResult, Event.Result
